txt.en: Seek out Lithgor Sandwolf and tell him of your accomplishments.

'You have my solemn thanks [placeholder]. Your efforts to unravel the mysteries of Angmar have born much fruit. You have conquered many of the threats which lie within our harsh lands, and in so doing proven yourself a hero without peer amongst my people - even if it seems that it may be of no avail.\nWe will sing of your deeds in the quiet hours of the night, long after the darkness out of Carn Dum has taken our lands for I can forsee no power that can halt the forces which have been set in motion against us.'
